name: button
desc: On mobile devices, the button that is displayed for bringing up the context-menu. By default there are two extra items displayed when viewing charts on a mobile device: a button in the top left corner, and a gear icon layed on the button. Customizing this button attribute will control the characteristics of the base button. If text is specified as an attribute, this button will be overlayed with that text and no icon. See text demo below for an example of using text.

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and
attrs.example: 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely

attrs.name: angle
attrs.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the object/shape. A positive value will
attrs.example: rotate the object by that number of degrees clockwise, while a negative

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object. A single color will create a solid background, while two colors will create a gradient.

attrs.name: background-color-1backgroundColor1
attrs.desc: Sets the first color of a 2 color background gradient of the object. Should be used with background-color-2.

attrs.name: background-color-2backgroundColor2
attrs.desc: Sets the second color of a 2 color background gradient of the object. Should be used with background-color-1.

attrs.name: background-fitbackgroundFit
attrs.desc: Sets the direction/s in which the background image is being "stretched".

attrs.name: background-imagebackgroundImage
attrs.desc: Sets a background image for the object. Value can be a local file or a web image's location.

attrs.name: background-positionbackgroundPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the position of the background when the background-repeat value is no-repeat.

attrs.name: background-repeatbackgroundRepeat
attrs.desc: Sets the repeating mode for the background image.

attrs.name: bold
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text is displayed with bold characters or not.

attrs.name: border-bottomborderBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom border style. The first attribute value sets the border thickness, the second sets the style, and the third sets the color.  Styles can be solid, dashed, or dotted.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. Should be used with border-width. See also line-color for closed shapes.

attrs.name: border-leftborderLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style. The first attribute value sets the border thickness, the second sets the style, and the third sets the color.  Styles can be solid, dashed, or dotted.

attrs.name: border-radiusborderRadius
attrs.desc: Sets the object's border radius. A larger radius will result in more rounded corners. Entering a string of four values will set the radius of each corner, starting with the top-right corner and moving clockwise around the object.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-leftborderRadiusBottomLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-left border radius, for rounded corners. Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners. A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-bottom-rightborderRadiusBottomRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's bottom-right border radius, for rounded corners. Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners. A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-leftborderRadiusTopLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-left border radius, for rounded corners. Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners. A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-radius-top-rightborderRadiusTopRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's top-right border radius, for rounded corners. Larger values create rounder corners, while smaller values create sharper corners. A negative value will cut a corner off without rounding.

attrs.name: border-rightborderRight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style. The first attribute value sets the border thickness, the second sets the style, and the third sets the color.  Styles can be solid, dashed, or dotted.

attrs.name: border-topborderTop
attrs.desc: Sets the object's left border style. The first attribute value sets the border thickness, the second sets the style, and the third sets the color.  Styles can be solid, dashed, or dotted.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object's border.

attrs.name: callout
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object's callout arrow is displayed or not.

attrs.name: callout-heightcalloutHeight
attrs.desc: Sets the height of the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-hookcalloutHook
attrs.desc: Sets a coordinate that the callout will point to.  Value will be an [x, y] coordinate, starting from the top left of the chart.

attrs.name: callout-offsetcalloutOffset
attrs.desc: Sets an offset for the callout arrow.  Positive and negative values can be used to move the callout arrow up, down, left, or right, depending on the callout-position.

attrs.name: callout-positioncalloutPosition
attrs.desc: Sets the location of the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: callout-widthcalloutWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object's callout arrow.

attrs.name: color
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font color.  Similar to font-color.

attrs.name: fill-anglefillAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the angle at which the background gradient will fill.

attrs.name: fill-offset-xfillOffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset for the background gradient.

attrs.name: fill-offset-yfillOffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset for the background gradient.

attrs.name: fill-typefillType
attrs.desc: Sets the background gradient fill type to either linear or radial.

attrs.name: font-anglefontAngle
attrs.desc: Sets the rotation angle of the object's text. A positive value will
attrs.example: rotate the object by that number of degrees clockwise, while a negative

attrs.name: font-colorfontColor
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font color.  Similar to color.

attrs.name: font-familyfontFamily
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font family.

attrs.name: font-sizefontSize
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font size.

attrs.name: font-stylefontStyle
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font style.  Similar to italic.

attrs.name: font-weightfontWeight
attrs.desc: Sets the object's font weight.  Similar to bold.

attrs.name: gradient-colorsgradientColors
attrs.desc: Sets a set of colors for a complex background gradient consisting of 2 or more colors.  To be used with gradient-stops.

attrs.name: gradient-stopsgradientStops
attrs.desc: Sets the gradient stops for a complex background gradient consisting of 2 or more colors.  To be used with gradient-colors.

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Sets the object's height.

attrs.name: italic
attrs.desc: Sets whether the object's displayed text is italic or not.  Similar to font-style.

attrs.name: max-charsmaxChars
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum numbers of characters displayed in the object.  The value determines how many characters will be displayed before the text is cut and appended with "..."

attrs.name: max-widthmaxWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the maximum width of the text box. If text is longer than the max-width value, it will overlap the box or will wrap if wrap-text is set to true.

attrs.name: offset-xoffsetX
attrs.desc: Sets an X offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: offset-yoffsetY
attrs.desc: Sets a Y offset to apply when positioning the object/shape.

attrs.name: padding
attrs.desc: Sets the padding around the object's text.  Up to four values can be used to set the padding around the text, with the first value being the top padding, the second value being the right padding, the third value being the bottom padding, and the fourth value being the left padding.

attrs.name: padding-bottompaddingBottom
attrs.desc: Sets the bottom padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: padding-leftpaddingLeft
attrs.desc: Sets the left padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: padding-rightpaddingRight
attrs.desc: Sets the right padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: padding-toppaddingTop
attrs.desc: Sets the top padding for the object's text.

attrs.name: rtl (right-to-left)
attrs.desc: Renders text right-to-left. Default value is false.

attrs.name: text
attrs.desc: Sets the text content of the object.

attrs.name: text-aligntextAlign
attrs.desc: Sets the horizontal alignment for the object's text.  Horizontal alignment can be left, center, or right.

attrs.name: text-alphatextAlpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object's text. Values must range between 0.0 and
attrs.example: 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely

attrs.name: text-decorationtextDecoration
attrs.desc: Sets the text's decoration to use underlined characters.  Similar to underline. May not display properly in Mozilla Firefox when charts are rendered using SVG.

attrs.name: underline
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text is displayed with underlined characters or not.  Similar to text-decoration. May not display properly in Mozilla Firefox when charts are rendered using SVG.

attrs.name: vertical-alignverticalAlign
attrs.desc: Sets the vertical alignment for the object's text.  Verical alignment can be top, middle, or bottom.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Sets whether the context-menu button is visible or not.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Sets the width of the object.

attrs.name: wrap-textwrapText
attrs.desc: Sets whether the text will wrap, depending on the width of the object.

attrs.name: x
attrs.desc: Sets the X position of the object.  The context-menu gear object must be positioned separately.

attrs.name: y
attrs.desc: Sets the Y position of the object.  The context-menu gear object must be positioned separately.
